text: Apfi pfifo pfawoneke mne ghamaono ghangu, wafalasi na awala yawawadinile. Tsawapfala maghwanda gha chuma mmambagha mwawo ighakalile madung'u ka ghumoto, pfine langi ya buluu ka mlanga, na njano ka libwe ilikwaka. Ghamatwi gha wafalasi wala tsaghakala ka ghamatwi gha simba, na mne milomo yawo tsaghulawa ghumoto na hosi na usaghe wa baluti.
